attrs.name: vertical
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: horizontal
attrs.desc: Whether it is a horizontal step bar
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: show-number
attrs.desc: Set whether to display sequence numbers for unfinished states.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: name-field
attrs.desc: Set the field name in the node information.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is name.

attrs.name: time-field
attrs.desc: Setting the name of the field corresponding to the node time information
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is time.

attrs.name: start
attrs.desc: Set the start step sequence number.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1.

attrs.name: space
attrs.desc: Set the width of the step bar

attrs.name: active
attrs.desc: Set the selected step of the step bar
attrs.defaultValue: The default value for this property is - 1

attrs.name: reverse
attrs.desc: Set the direction of the vertical step bar
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

slots.name: top
slots.desc: Define the top of the step bar

slots.name: bottom
slots.desc: Define the bottom of the step bar

slots.name: left
slots.desc: Define the content on the left of the step bar.

slots.name: right
slots.desc: Define the content on the right of the step bar

events.name: click
events.desc: Click event of a node. arguments: arg1: click the subscript of a node, arg2: {name: node name, time: time}
